First!!

So, how did you find isohunt, and how do you like it?
I started linking my U/L's to there as well.
Its kinda odd how they do it.
As always, thank you Goosey!!
Yea, it is weird - how you post a "release" and then tie the torrent to it. Isohunt is supposedly the #3 "torrent" site so that's why I'm there.

Sometimes It is already linked for me.
I've been using this additional tracker for the last few days:
http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce
Don't know if it helps, but hey...spread the virus!
Yup, the openbittorrent tracker has been in these torrents too, though not as the primary tracker. If / when tpb or mn goes, these will live on.
